original_text: The people in the city did not agree with each other. Some of them believed the message from the apostles, Paul and Barnabas. But some people agreed with the Jews who did not believe their message.
korean_text: 그 시내의 무리가 나뉘어 유대인을 따르는 자도 있고 두 사도를 따르는 자도 있는지라

sentences.original_text: The people in the city did not agree with each other
sentences.korean_translation: 성 안에 있는 사람들은 서로 동의하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Some of them believed the message from the apostles
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 이들은 사도들의 메시지를 믿었다

sentences.original_text: But some people agreed with the Jews
who did not believe their message
